title: Part Two: Maid for Love
description: Caroline O'Hara had been a published historical romance writer for over a decade, but her fan response was just not what it used to be. Her agent informed her that she would be dropped as a client unless she found a new way to sell more books. Saddened, she began to research erotica, the hottest reads that are gaining popularity every day. Her first erotic novel was a hit, so Caroline decided to try something new. But in order to be a successful writer, she must first learn about what she writes. Caroline revives her marriage as she rebuilds her career- one sexy story at a time. This series contains mature content suitable for adults.
author: Kendra Glenn
